languages.text: "А, Ваша Светлость". {n}Ахиллеас непривычно задумчив.{/n} "Прошу вас, уделите мне свое драгоценное время. Я собрал важную информацию, но... Для начала пройдем в кабинет — подальше от лишних ушей".

traits.locale_text: "А, Ваша Светлость". {n}Ахиллеас непривычно задумчив.{/n} "Прошу вас, уделите мне свое драгоценное время. Я собрал важную информацию, но... Для начала пройдем в кабинет — подальше от лишних ушей".
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."
languages.original_text: "А, Ваша Светлость". {n}Ахиллеас непривычно задумчив.{/n} "Прошу вас, уделите мне свое драгоценное время. Я собрал важную информацию, но... Для начала пройдем в кабинет — подальше от лишних ушей".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: « Ah, Votre Seigneurie, {n}dit un Achilleas étrangement pensif.{/n} Puis-je vous demander quelques instants de votre précieux temps ? Des informations de la plus haute importance ont été portées à mon attention, mais... Nous devrions tout d'abord nous rendre dans votre bureau, pour éviter les oreilles indiscrètes. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, Votre Seigneurie, {n}dit un Achilleas étrangement pensif.{/n} Puis-je vous demander quelques instants de votre précieux temps ? Des informations de la plus haute importance ont été portées à mon attention, mais... Nous devrions tout d'abord nous rendre dans votre bureau, pour éviter les oreilles indiscrètes. »
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: “啊，大人。”{n}阿吉里亚斯的声音充满了深思的意味，与平时截然不同。{/n}“可以占用您一点点宝贵的时间吗？某些重要的情报引起了我的注意，不过……我们还是先去您的书房吧，以免我们的谈话被外人听到。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."

traits.locale_text: “啊，大人。”{n}阿吉里亚斯的声音充满了深思的意味，与平时截然不同。{/n}“可以占用您一点点宝贵的时间吗？某些重要的情报引起了我的注意，不过……我们还是先去您的书房吧，以免我们的谈话被外人听到。”
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: 「ああ、陛下」{n}アキレアスは珍しく物思いにふけっている。{/n}「陛下のお時間を拝借できますか？重大な情報を耳にしたのです。ただ…立ち聞きされぬよう、書斎へ向かいましょう」
languages.original_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、陛下」{n}アキレアスは珍しく物思いにふけっている。{/n}「陛下のお時間を拝借できますか？重大な情報を耳にしたのです。ただ…立ち聞きされぬよう、書斎へ向かいましょう」
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Ah, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Achilleas wirkt ungewohnt nachdenklich.{/n} "Darf ich Euch um einen kostbaren Moment Eurer Zeit bitten? Es wurden mir kritische Informationen zugetragen, aber ... Bitte lasst uns zunächst in Euer Arbeitszimmer gehen, damit uns keiner zuhört."
languages.original_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Achilleas wirkt ungewohnt nachdenklich.{/n} "Darf ich Euch um einen kostbaren Moment Eurer Zeit bitten? Es wurden mir kritische Informationen zugetragen, aber ... Bitte lasst uns zunächst in Euer Arbeitszimmer gehen, damit uns keiner zuhört."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: «Ah, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Achilleas parece inusualmente pensativo.{/n} «¿Podría concederme unos valiosos minutos de su tiempo? Ha llegado a mis manos cierta información, pero... por favor, vayamos primero a su estudio, lejos de oídos curiosos».
languages.original_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Achilleas parece inusualmente pensativo.{/n} «¿Podría concederme unos valiosos minutos de su tiempo? Ha llegado a mis manos cierta información, pero... por favor, vayamos primero a su estudio, lejos de oídos curiosos».
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: "Ah, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Achilleas, her zamankinin aksine oldukça endişeli görünüyor.{/n} "Değerli zamanınızın bir kısmını rica edebilir miyim? Dikkatime bazı kritik önem taşıyan bilgiler sunuldu ancak... Kimsenin konuşmamıza kulak misafiri olmaması adına öncelikle çalışma odanıza geçelim lütfen."
languages.original_text: "Ah, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Achilleas appears uncharacteristically pensive.{/n} "Might I ask for a few precious moments of your time? Critical information has come to my attention, however... Please let us first proceed to your study lest we be overheard."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Achilleas her zamankinin aksine oldukça endişeli görünüyor.{/n} "Değerli zamanınızın bir kısmını rica edebilir miyim? Dikkatime bazı kritik önem taşıyan bilgiler sunuldu ancak lütfen kimsenin konuşmamıza kulak misafiri olmaması adına öncelikle çalışma odanıza geçelim."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr
